title.rendered: Sugaring Brooklyn – Park Slope Sugaring NYC Location

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Sugaring NYC Location in Brooklyn ( Address is 100 7th Avenue, Brooklyn NY 11215) opened its doors in January 2020 making it the 7th location for Sugaring NYC in New York and 5 Boroughs. This state of the art facility features 8 Sugaring hair removal treatment rooms, spacious reception area, gender-neutral restrooms and most important, amazing team of Sugaring Esthetitians ready to help you with all your hair removal needs.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

“Bless God you guys came to Park Slope…Finally”

Yelp Customer, Jan 2020

“Deep Down in Slopes”

@theprettystyling INSTAGRAM

“great addition to Flatbush Avenue Infrastructure”

Brooklyn Voice, Weekly Magazine

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]﻿[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

new timelyButton(“sugaringnycllc”, {“imgSrc”:”https://www.sugaringnyc.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/bookBTN-red.png”});

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Sugaring NYC Brooklyn Location is conveniently located on the 7th Avenue, only a few blocks away from Flatbush Avenue and Barkley’s Center.[/vc_column_text]

Sugaring NYC Brooklyn
100 7th Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11215

(347) 529-4742

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”7011″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]Closest Subway Stops:

7th Avenue B and Q Trains
Grand Army Plaza 2, 3 and 4 Trains[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”7018″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]B67 and B69 Bus Stops in front of the Sugaring NYC Brooklyn Location[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
